contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|dropout}} '''Dropout''' may refer to: *[[Dropping out]] of society or school. ==In science== *[[Dropout (astronomy)]]. *[[Dropout (bicycle part)]]. *[[Dropout (electronics)]]. *Dropout as a [[Biased_sample#Types_of_sampling_bias|type of sampling bias]] in scientific studies ==Popular culture== *[[Dropout (1970 film)]], an Italian film by [[Tinto Brass]] starring [[Vanessa Redgrave]]. *"Drop Out," a song from the album ''[[Scream, Dracula, Scream!]]'' by Rocket from the Crypt. *"Drop Out", a song from the album ''[[You Fail Me]]'' by [[Converge (band)|Converge]]. *"Drop Out", a song by NW260 released for the video game ''[[Dance Dance Revolution Extreme (North America)|Dance Dance Revolution Extreme]]'' *''[[The College Dropout]]'', the debut album released by rapper Kanye West in 2004. *''[[Drop Out with The Barracudas]]'', the debut album by The Barracudas. {{disambiguation}}
